title: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Cross-cultural mathematical problem-solving project with asynchronous collaboration between university students from South Africa and Mexico, accounting for cultural differences

learning_goals: Collaborate with international team members to mathematically model real-life problems.
Share data analysis results reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds via a Learning Management System (LMS).
Propose at least three strategies to overcome language/time zone differences in COIL (Collaborative Online International Learning) environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
